overview: Andy Walker, bullied and taunted with being a coward, leaves town on a freight. The brakeman shoots two ruffians, but Andy is hailed as the hero and made a deputy sheriff.
tagline: It takes a fighting man to win the kind of battle the happy-go-lucky adventurer in this story got into! And, man alive! how he fought - when he had to!
title: Kindled Courage
